quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
Give a try; give a shot. Sometimes, you must not only expect the way to be too clear; strike when you can!
If you want to strike, strike now. No matter how skillfully a footballer strikes beyond the 90 minutes' regulated time, he makes no influence. Strike now before it becomes too late!
If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
Strike against war, for without you no battles can be fought!
You must be strong enough to strike and strike and strike again without tiring. The first lesson is to make yourself that strong.
Never strike out of anger if at all possible, this will give your enemy the advantage and strengthen his resolve and psyche
Don't say you won't strike now. 'Not now' is what brings forth "never done". Strike it early, strike it now. But remember to strike it hard! Go and make the strike!
Strike hard and fast and do not separate.
Not only strike while the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
You have to know when to strike and when to retreat.
Let nature take its course and your tools will strike at the right moment.
Strike fast, strike hard, strike often.
Strike while the iron is hot.
Strike, if you will, but listen.
With luck, you have other things to do than wait for lightning to strike.
When something horrible is done to you, the natural impulse is to strike back.
That which is striking and beautiful is not always good, but that which is good is always beautiful.
It is striking to see the magnitude of impact mentorship and tutoring can have on student performance and young lives.
Always mystify, mislead, and surprise the enemy, if possible; and when you strike and overcome him, never let up in the pursuit...
